spec_data.Name: erlang-proper
spec_data.Description:
PropEr (PROPerty-based testing tool for ERlang) is a QuickCheck-inspired
open-source property-based testing tool for Erlang.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 01:54:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A QuickCheck-inspired property-based testing tool for Erlang
